alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 5:30PM CDT until April 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gunnison to 7 miles northeast of Montrose, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Gunnison and Deeson around 535 PM CDT. Lake Village and Shelby around 545 PM CDT. Mound Bayou around 550 PM CDT. Winterville around 610 PM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 615 PM CDT. Leland around 625 PM CDT. Tribbett around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Arcola, Alligator, Beulah, Pace, Winstonville, Duncan, Merigold and Halley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
